name: OBJ Lift
description: A lift object with various configurations and movement types.

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The variable that activates this lift.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The type of the lift plate.

1.name: Alternative V4 Types
1.description: An alternative variant of the lift types.

fields.name: Activation Requirement
fields.description: Defines the condition required to activate the lift.

2.name: Must be activated by variable
2.description: Requires a specific variable to activate.

fields.name: Direction
fields.description: The direction the lift will move in.

fields.name: Lift Type
fields.description: The type of the lift (movable or static).

fields.name: Lift Plate Type
fields.description: The type of the lift plate.

5.description: A 5x5 gray lift plate with four switches.

12.description: A 3x3 yellow lift plate with a switch that appears.
